data.trans_hint: Làm thế nào cô ấy có thể giải thích nếu bạn tiếp tục ngắt lời?
data.en_hint: How can she explain if you keep butting in?
data.content_game_1: How can she explain if you keep butting in?
data.answer_en_hint: How can she explain if you keep butting in?

data.trans: Bất chợt nói ra, thốt lên
data.trans_hint: Mọi người phá lên cười khi cô ấy thốt lên điều đó.
data.en_hint: Everyone just burst out laughing when she came out with it.
data.content_game_1: Everyone just burst out laughing when she came out with it.
data.answer_en_hint: Everyone just burst out laughing when she came out with it.

data.trans_hint: Bạn không thể trò chuyện thực sự với cô ấy — cô ấy cứ nói lấn át bạn mọi lúc.
data.en_hint: You can't have a real conversation with her—she just talks at you all the time.
data.content_game_1: You can't have a real conversation with her—she just talks at you all the time.
data.answer_en_hint: You can't have a real conversation with her—she just talks at you all the time.

data.trans: (Giọng) Dần dần nhỏ lại và mất hẳn
data.trans_hint: Giọng cô nhỏ dần khi cô nhìn thấy vẻ mặt của anh ấy.
data.en_hint: Her voice trailed off as she saw the look on his face.
data.content_game_1: Her voice trailed off as she saw the look on his face.
data.answer_en_hint: Her voice trailed off as she saw the look on his face.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không có ý tiết lộ bí mật - Tôi chỉ buột miệng nói thôi.
data.en_hint: I didn't mean to reveal the secret - I just blurted it out.
data.content_game_1: I didn't mean to reveal the secret - I just blurted it out.
data.answer_en_hint: I didn't mean to reveal the secret - I just blurted it out.

data.trans: (Là người đầu tiên) Tiết lộ chuyện gì đó
data.trans_hint: Bác sĩ là người đầu tiên tiết lộ cho gia đình rằng cô ấy đã mang thai.
data.en_hint: The doctor broke the news to the family that she was pregnant.
data.content_game_1: The doctor broke the news to the family that she was pregnant.
data.answer_en_hint: The doctor broke the news to the family that she was pregnant.

data.trans: Đề cập đến vấn đề gì
data.trans_hint: Đây không phải lúc thích hợp để đề cập đến tiền bạc.
data.en_hint: It's not the right time to bring up the money.
data.content_game_1: It's not the right time to bring up the money.
data.answer_en_hint: It's not the right time to bring up the money.

data.trans: Bắt đầu cuộc trò chuyện (thân mật)
data.trans_hint: Anh ta cố gắng bắt đầu cuộc trò chuyện với cô ấy, nhưng cô ấy chỉ bỏ đi.
data.en_hint: He tried to engage her in a conversation, but she just walked away.
data.content_game_1: He tried to engage her in a conversation, but she just walked away.
data.answer_en_hint: He tried to engage her in a conversation, but she just walked away.

data.trans: Nghe, hiểu điều ai đó đang nói
data.trans_hint: Tôi không thể hiểu những gì giáo viên tôi đang nói, nhưng cô ấy trông như thể cô ấy đang nuốt từng lời vậy.
data.en_hint: I can't make out what the teacher is saying, but she looks as if she is drinking in her words.
data.content_game_1: I can't make out what the teacher is saying, but she looks as if she is drinking in her words.
data.answer_en_hint: I can't make out what the teacher is saying, but she looks as if she is drinking in her words.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta thề sẽ không hé nửa lời về cái tai nạn này, và tôi tin anh ta.
data.en_hint: He swore that he wouldn't breathe a word about the accident, and i believed him.
data.content_game_1: He swore that he wouldn't breathe a word about the accident, and i believed him.
data.answer_en_hint: He swore that he wouldn't breathe a word about the accident, and i believed him.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy phải nói về một chủ đề nghiêm túc, nhưng anh ta thực sự làm nó trở nên hứng thú bằng cách nói chêm vào một vài câu chuyện cười.
data.en_hint: He had to talk about a very serious topic, but he really lightened it up by slipping in a few jokes.
data.content_game_1: He had to talk about a very serious topic, but he really lightened it up by slipping in a few jokes.
data.answer_en_hint: He had to talk about a very serious topic, but he really lightened it up by slipping in a few jokes.

data.trans: Bắt đầu cuộc trò chuyện (xã giao)
data.trans_hint: Có thể rất đáng sợ khi bước ra khỏi vùng an toàn để bắt chuyện với một người lạ.
data.en_hint: It can be very scary to step out of the comfort zone to strike up a conversation with a stranger.
data.content_game_1: It can be very scary to step out of the comfort zone to strike up a conversation with a stranger.
data.answer_en_hint: It can be very scary to step out of the comfort zone to strike up a conversation with a stranger.
